q1: Pele is Brazil's top goalscorer of all-time.
a1: But it will be surpassed by neymar
q2: How many goals has Neymar scored for Brazil?
a2: Neymar has scored 60 goals for the senior Brazil team.
q3: You think Neymar is better player?
a3: No Pele has and always will be a better player then Neymar will ever be.
q4: What is the difference between Pele and Neymar?
a4: nothing the two are almost equal by their way of playing
